references.reason: This paper introduced the foundational concept of diffusion models, which are crucial for many current generative AI tasks like image synthesis and editing and the foundation for many other important papers

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced Latent Diffusion Models (LDMs), which are currently the prominent generative model architecture for tasks like image synthesis and editing and the foundation for Stable Diffusion.

references.paper_title: Glide: Towards photorealistic image generation and editing with text-guided diffusion models
references.reason: This paper explored a more efficient way to guide diffusion models, combining the best aspects of classifier-free guidance and classifier guidance.
This paper introduced classifier-free guidance, which significantly improves the quality of samples from diffusion models without needing to train separate classifiers.

references.paper_title: Progressive Growing of GANs for Improved Quality, Stability, and Variation
references.reason: While not about diffusion models directly, this paper introduced techniques that are foundational to many generative model architectures, such as progressive growing.
